results.content: GDPR is not an easy subject so be patient until section 5 where things will get more practical for Wordpress site owners. This course was not perfect but it was definitely helpful ! Thanks for making it available !

results.content: This course serves as a great introduction to making your WP website compliant with GDPR. Priyanka doesn't just tell what to click and change in your WP Dashboard but also gives you some underlying knowledge about the regulation itself and what impact it will have on your organisation and website. All the plugins mentioned in the course can be trusted and used to provide checkboxes for user's consent or links to your privacy policy and T&C pages. Sometimes, the accent was harder to understand but you can also use automatic closed captions to help yourself. Most other courses I took about GDPR focus on the legal aspects and less on actions you can do to make your website GDPR compliant. Therefore, this approach makes it more valuable, especially if you already possess some knowledge about the regulation or have read the legislation itself.

results.content:
I had and idea about GDPR ( learning by doing) but this course provided a check-list and now I know what I need to improve in my work.
Thank you!
